trans-unit.source: Specifies the current stage of a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] download operation.

DeploymentProgressState is passed by way of the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A> member of <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs>, which is used by the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: 藉由傳遞 DeploymentProgressState<xref:System.Deployment.Application.DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A>隸屬<xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs>，可由<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>， <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>，和<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>事件。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the members of this enumeration to determine what portion of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment has already been downloaded to the local machine.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個列舉的成員來判斷哪些部分[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]部署已下載到本機電腦。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] is downloading the DLLs and data files that comprised the application.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]正在下載應用程式所組成的 Dll 和資料檔案。
[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]正在下載應用程式資訊清單。
